name: Kanoe Kruise
description: Kanoe Kruise places you in the deep end of Newry Canal, you’ve signed yourself up for a huge cash reward of £5,000! The catch? A challenge which will test your resilience and skills within a Canoe. How fast will you be able to race down the canal at your fastest pace whilst avoiding various dangerous objects which will slow you down are make you sink, Fastest Down gets the cash Lets Race!
